item.title: Hmm, strange problem
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

Well my problem is that when I value an item of my pkpoint reward shop it appears like this :

“This item currently costs 40 pk points”
“This item currently costs 40 coins” - I WANT THIS MESSAGE REMOVED.

So I looked further into it and here’s my code

if (MyShopID == 1) { sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" pkpoints"+ShopAdd); } if (MyShopID == 19) { sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" points"+ShopAdd); } else { sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" coins"+ShopAdd); }

I have fixed the problem to this by changing the last else statment to an else if statment and adding each of the non-pkpoint shops seperatly, but that takes time. Is there a quicker way to fix it?

Read full topic
